title: INtravel

items.description: Apple unveiled a slew of product updates at its annual fall event in California. For travelers, some of the revamped devices stood out above the rest.

items.title: Deal of the day: Book nonstop lie-flat seats to Paris or Amsterdam for just 38,000 Capital One miles

items.title: Farewell — and good riddance? JetBlue retires its smallest, most outdated plane
